name: Research Opportunity Program
description: This course provides a rewarding opportunity for students in their fourth year to undertake relatively advanced work in the research project of a professor in return for SOC499Y5 course credit. Participating faculty members post their project descriptions for the following summer and fall/winter sessions in early February and students are invited to apply in early March. SeeÿExperiential and International Opportunitiesÿfor more details.
exclusions: Students may not take SOC499H5 and SOC499Y5 concurrently.
